AI Recruiter

Hire for Culture,
Not Just for Skill.

Our AI Recruiter automates the entire hiring process, from sourcing to interviewing. It ensures every candidate is a perfect fit for your company culture, not just the job description.

  • Automated Interviews

    Conducts initial interviews 24/7.

  • Cultural Alignment

    Screens candidates for cultural and value alignment.

  • Consistent Evaluation

    Removes bias and ensures a consistent hiring process.

Hire This Agent
AI Manager

Run Your Business On Autopilot.

The AI Operations Manager handles the day-to-day tasks that keep your business running. From managing projects to tracking metrics, this agent is your partner in operational excellence.

  • Project Management

    Keeps projects on track and reports on progress.

  • Performance Dashboards

    Monitors key business metrics in real-time.

  • Workflow Automation

    Automates repetitive administrative tasks.

Hire This Agent
AI SEO Specialist

Climb the Ranks. Dominate Search.

Our AI SEO Specialist automates the complex work of search engine optimization for WordPress & WooCommerce. It optimizes your products, blogs, and tags to improve rankings and drive organic traffic.

  • Automated SEO Audits

    Constantly monitors and improves your site's SEO.

  • Content Optimization

    Optimizes blog posts and product pages for search.

  • Rank Tracking

    Tracks your keyword rankings and reports on progress.

Hire This Agent
AI Social Media Manager

Your Brand, Everywhere. Your Content, Perfected.

The AI Social Media Manager creates winning strategies, designs beautiful posts, writes engaging captions, and builds a content calendar. It even schedules and posts for you across all your platforms.

  • Strategy & Calendars

    Builds and manages your social media content calendar.

  • Content Creation

    Designs posts and writes captions in your brand's voice.

  • Automated Scheduling

    Schedules and publishes content across platforms.

Hire This Agent
How it works

Your AI Workforce, Ready in
3 Simple Steps.

1. Hire & Train Your Agent

Select a role-specific AI agent and train it on your brand voice, culture, and KPIs. It's like onboarding, but faster.

2. Delegate Work & Set Goals

Assign tasks and projects to your AI employees just like you would with a human team. Set clear goals and let your workforce execute.

3. Monitor Performance & Scale

Track your agents' performance on a simple dashboard. As your company grows, you can easily add more AI employees to your team.

Faq’s

Your Questions, Answered.

Here are some of the most common questions we get about Yodha, our Digital Employee Platform. If you have other questions, feel free to reach out to our team.

Yodha is a Digital Employee Platform that allows you to hire specialized AI agents to run critical business functions. Instead of using fragmented SaaS tools, you get a cohesive AI workforce that you can manage like real employees.

Most AI companies build single-use tools that solve tasks. Yodha builds a workforce that solves entire functions. Other AI acts as an assistant; a Yodha is a digital employee. SaaS gives you software; Yodha gives you a team.

You can hire role-specific AI agents like an AI SEO Specialist, an AI Recruiter, an AI Social Media Manager, and an AI Operations Manager. We are constantly adding new roles to the platform.

You manage your Yodhas through a simple dashboard. You can onboard them, assign them roles and tasks, train them on your company culture, and measure their performance with clear metrics, just like you would with a human team.

Our Vision

The Future of Work is a Workforce, Not More Tools.

Yodha is at the forefront of the next big wave in SaaS: the Digital Employee market. We're not just building features; we're building a scalable, autonomous workforce for your business. Here's our vision for the future.

Our Roadmap

The Autonomous Workforce (Now)

  • Hire specialized AI agents for core business functions.
  • Cover SEO, HR, Social Media, and Operations.
  • Build your foundational AI team today.

The Growing Ecosystem (Next)

  • Expanding our workforce with new agents.
  • Adding Finance, Customer Support, and Sales Ops.
  • Creating a fully integrated, multi-disciplinary AI team.

The Company-in-a-Box (Future)

  • Our long-term vision: a fully autonomous company.
  • Hire and sync an entire AI team from day one.
  • Scale your business with near-zero human overhead.
